item.title: Playing with GitHub Container Registry REST API
item.description: I’ve a day to catch up on blogging. I’m building a “thing” and getting this near to the finish line consumes my time and has meant that I’m not originating anything particularly new. However, there are a couple of tricks in my deployment process that may be of interest to others. I’ve been a long-term using of Google’s [Cloud Build] and like the simplicity (everything’s a container, alot!). Because I’m using GitHub repos, I’ve been using GitHub Actions to (re)build containers on pushes and GitHub Container registry (GHCR) to store the results.
